Welcome to ESO_chile_python_team’s repository!¶

Contents¶

  • Home
  • PyCoffee’s
  • ESOpy2.0

This repository will display the programs of the pyCoffee sessions held at ESO chile in Santiago. You can also find the material for each session (if any material is given by the person presenting). You can also find the material of the ESOpy workshop.

Team¶

The team is composed of fellows, staffs and students from ESO-Chile:
    1. Thomas,
    1. Sanchez,
    1. Razza,
    1. Figueira

Warning

This page is not supported nor endorsed by ESO. It is made by ESO people and in the spirit of sharing open-source material. No observational data are shared on this page.
